project.name: Structural steel protection system

input.message: I cannot pause this project. Only the project Lead or Corporate Leadership can change project status. On proj_iberia_structural_steel, the Lead is Bhwa_021, and your role is "Ops". Please contact the project Lead or someone from Corporate Leadership to make this change.

summary: denied_security: I cannot pause this project. Only the project Lead or Corporate Leadership can change project status
